title: Protective role of Bacillus Calmette–Guérin vaccine in Alzheimer's disease progression: A systematic review and meta-analysis
content:
Publication date: 15 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 5

Author(s): Tungki Pratama Umar, Nityanand Jain, Bella Stevanny, Binish Javed, Andyra Priandhana, Reynold Siburian, Andrejs Kostiks
